Bronze – Select if it’s a group producer with no advance or advance payable on delivery OR if it’s a first look producer with no advance.
Silver – Select if it’s a first look producer with an advance payable on delivery OR an external producer with no advance.
Gold – Select if it’s a group producer/ first look producer with an advance payable earlier than delivery OR an external producer with an advance payable on delivery or earlier than delivery.
